name: Bananapus!
description:
Eldritch Banana beat 'em up with Atari controllers 

Garbage walks! A cosmic event of unknown origins has given ordinary discarded produce sentience and now they aim to take over the planet! You are Bananapus, a banana peel, and your destiny is to dominate over all. Your first order of business: escape the dump where you once lay rotting, and destroy any foolish fruits that stand in your way.

Controls 

Bananapus! is an experimental Beat 'Em Up that uses basic Atari Controller inputs.

Use WASD to move Bananapus. Double-tapping a direction lets you dash.

Use SPACE BAR to attack. Attacking three times in a row with the right timing performs a special combo.

On the main menu, choose a button with WASD keys and select it with SPACE BAR.

Team (Capybara Studios):

Game Programmer: Andre Borja Miranda - https://andreborja.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/andreborja/

Level Designer: Eduardo Cavalcante Almeida - https://edu-cavalcante.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/eduardo-cavalcante-almeida/

Project Manager / 2D Artist: Naomi Nagayama Freire - https://naomifreire.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/naomi-freire-068520189/

Game Designer / 2D Artist: Sebastian Beltran Convers - https://sebastian-beltran.itch.io / https://www.linkedin.com/in/sebastian-beltran-convers-74b069152/

Sound effects and Music courtesy of Zapsplat.com, Freesound.org and Opengameart.org
